name: Spotify
title: spotify.com
shortDescription: Spotify is a digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs and podcasts. It's designed for music lovers and podcast enthusiasts who want to explore a vast library of audio content. Users can create playlists, discover new music, or enjoy curated lists. For example, a user might use Spotify to find the perfect playlist for a workout or to explore new podcasts on topics of interest.
cons: Occasional ads in the free version
Limited offline playback for free users

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Apple Music
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers exclusive content and spatial audio
